sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我想报名参加这个比赛。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bàomíng cānjiā zhège bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais m'inscrire à cette compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to sign up for this competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chūxí le huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a assisté à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He attended the meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chōu le yī zhī yān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a fumé une cigarette.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He smoked a cigarette.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huāyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō chóngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'insectes dans le jardin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many insects in the garden.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ yǒu jǐ chù cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a quelques erreurs ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are a few errors here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì Zhōngguó de chuántǒng wénhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est la culture traditionnelle chinoise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is traditional Chinese culture.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè zhèngshì de chǎnghé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une occasion formelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a formal occasion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān wǎnshang qù sànbù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais me promener tous les soirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go for a walk every evening.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dǎkāi chuānghu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ouvrir la fenêtre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please open the window.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī píng chúnjìngshuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une bouteille d'eau purifiée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a bottle of purified water.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chuāngzi guānhǎo le ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fenêtre est-elle bien fermée ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is the window closed properly?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 从此以后，他们成了好朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cóngcǐ yǐhòu, tāmen chéng le hǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Depuis lors, ils sont devenus bons amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: From then on, they became good friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měi zhōu dǎsǎo yī cì fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je nettoie ma chambre une fois par semaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I clean my room once a week.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 从此他改变了生活方式。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cóngcǐ tā gǎibiàn le shēnghuó fāngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dès lors, il a changé son mode de vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: From then on, he changed his lifestyle.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件事促使他做出了决定。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì cùshǐ tā zuòchū le juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet événement l'a poussé à prendre une décision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This event prompted him to make a decision.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòng kěyǐ cùjìn jiànkāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'exercice peut favoriser la santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Exercise can promote health.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào zhèngquè dá'àn ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Connais-tu la bonne réponse ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you know the correct answer?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèngfǔ cǎiqǔ le xīn de cuòshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement a pris de nouvelles mesures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government has taken new measures.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhàokāi le niándù dàhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a tenu son assemblée annuelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company held its annual meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā qù Zhōngguó dàlù lǚxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il voyage en Chine continentale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He travels to mainland China.
